title: Technology-Enhanced Language Class Orchestration Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental ICT utilization skills and basic language education concepts
context.additional_context: Focus on developing customized language education scenarios and integrating technology for workplace learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design a technology-based monitoring system to analyze learner engagement in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can propose at least three digital tool strategies for coordinating language learning activities in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
Learners can develop and apply a technology-integrated instructional framework optimized for small learner groups to real-world educational scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
